Acumen.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies slowed by Explosive Flask.

Catalyst.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Targets hit with Explosive Flask are marked for 3s and take 40% increased damage from your Weapon Shots.

Combat Medic.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Potion Launcher now also heals allies for 750 health.

From Above.card_desc: [Weightless] Reduces the Cooldown of Weightless by {scale=.5|.5}s.

Gift Giver.card_desc: [Healing Potion] You gain {scale=20|20}% of Healing Potion’s effect if you hit a teammate but not yourself.

Graviton.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Increase the duration of Explosive Flask's slow by {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Medicinal Excellence.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Increase the Radius of your Healing Potion by {scale=8|8}%

Mega Potion.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Healing Potion heals allies for 100% more.

Moxie.card_desc: [Armor] Receive {scale=6|6}% increased healing when below 50% Health.

Pep in the Step.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Allies hit by Healing Potion gain {scale=6|6}% movement speed for 3s.

Refreshing Jog.card_desc: [Weightless] Regenerate {scale=50|50} Health every second while in Weightless.

Reload.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Instantly reduce Healing Potion's Cooldown by {scale=0.6|0.6}s for each ally hit.

Shrewd Move.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=8|8}%

Side Tanks.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Reduce the Cooldown of Explosive Flask by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Smithereens.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Hitting an enemy with Explosive Flask generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Sprint.card_desc: [Weightless] Gain an additional {scale=10|10}% bonus Jump Speed during Weightless.

Sturdy.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon no longer knocks you back and deals {scale=20|20}% less self damage.

Entfesselung.card_desc: [Schwerelos] Während Schwerelos wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Erfrischung.card_desc: [Schwerelos] Während Schwerelos wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Fit im Schritt.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Triffst du einen Verbündeten mit Lebenstrank, erhöht sich dessen Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=6|6}%.

Gerissenheit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=8|8}%.

Graviton.card_desc: [Explosivkolben] Erhöht die Dauer der Verlangsamung von Explosivkolben um {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Heilkompetenz.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Erhöht den Radius von Lebenstrank um {scale=8|8}%.

Katalysator.card_desc: [Explosivkolben] Explosivkolben markiert getroffene Ziele 3s lang. Deine Waffenschüsse fügen ihnen 40% mehr Schaden zu.

Kleine Geschenke.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Du erhältst {scale=20|20}% des Heileffekts von Lebenstrank, wenn du ein Teammitglied und nicht dich selbst triffst.

Mega-Trank.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Die Heilung von Lebenstrank wird um 100% erhöht.

Mumm.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=6|6}% erhöhte Heilung.

Nachladen.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Lebenstrank pro getroffenem Verbündeten sofort um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Sanit\u00e4ter.card_desc: [Lebenstrank] Vom Trankwerfer getroffene Verbündete werden nun 750 LP geheilt.

Scharfsinn.card_desc: [Explosivkolben] Gewährt zusätzlich {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub gegen mit Explosivkolben verlangsamte Gegner.

Seitentanks.card_desc: [Explosivkolben] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Explosivkolben um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Standhaft.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Waffe stößt dich nicht mehr zurück und verursacht {scale=20|20}% weniger Selbstverletzung.

Von oben.card_desc: [Schwerelos] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schwerelos um {scale=.5|.5}s.

As de l'\u00e9vasion.card_desc: [Légèreté] Pendant légèreté, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Bienfaiteur.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Vous profitez de {scale=20|20}% des soins de la Potion de soin si elle touche un allié mais pas vous-même.

Bond revigorant.card_desc: [Légèreté] Vous récupérez {scale=50|50} PV par seconde pendant Légèreté.

Catalyseur.card_desc: [Fiole explosive] Fiole explosive augmente de 40% les dégâts de votre arme contre les cibles atteintes pendant 3s.

Cran.card_desc: [Armure] Vous recevez {scale=6|6}% de soins en plus quand vous avez moins de 50% de PV.

En miettes.card_desc: [Fiole explosive] Si Fiole explosive touche au moins un ennemi, vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Excellence m\u00e9dicale.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Le rayon de la Potion de soin augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Gravit\u00e9.card_desc: [Fiole explosive] Fiole explosive ralentit {scale=0.25|0.25}s de plus.

Marche dynamique.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Potion de soin augmente la vitesse des alliés atteints de {scale=6|6}% pendant 3s.

M\u00e9decin de bataille.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Le lance-potions rend 750 PV aux alliés.

M\u00e9ga potion.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Potion de soin rend deux fois plus de PV aux alliés.

Rechargement.card_desc: [Potion de soin] Potion de soin se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite par allié atteint.

R\u00e9servoirs.card_desc: [Fiole explosive] Fiole explosive se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Robustesse.card_desc: [Arme] Votre arme ne vous repousse pas et vous inflige {scale=20|20}% de dégâts en moins.

Ruse.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=8|8}%.

Sagacit\u00e9.card_desc: [Fiole explosive] Vous obtenez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie contre les ennemis ralentis par Fiole explosive.

Sprint.card_desc: [Légèreté] Votre vitesse de saut augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant Légèreté.

Vivacit\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

\u51b2\u523a.card_desc: [飞毛腿] 技能激活时，获得{scale=10|10}%额外的跳跃速度

\u533b\u836f\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 技能的作用半径增加{scale=8|8}%

\u5907\u7528\u836f\u7f50.card_desc: [爆炸药瓶] 爆炸药瓶的冷却时间降低{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u5f3a\u5065.card_desc: [武器] 你的武器不再击退你自己，自我伤害减少{scale=20|20}%

\u5feb\u901f\u88c5\u586b.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 每治疗一个队友都会减少治疗药剂的冷却时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u632f\u594b\u8bad\u7ec3.card_desc: [飞毛腿] 技能持续期间，每秒回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u654f\u9510.card_desc: [爆炸药瓶] 攻击被爆炸药瓶减速的敌人获得{scale=10|10}%的生命偷取

\u707e\u96be\u914d\u65b9.card_desc: [爆炸药水] 被爆炸药水命中的敌人会被标记3秒，普通攻击对带有标记的敌人伤害提高40%。

\u788e\u7247I.card_desc: [爆炸药瓶] 命中敌人时可以回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u7a7a\u4e2d\u6253\u51fb.card_desc: [飞毛腿] 冷却时间减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u7cbe\u529b.card_desc: [护甲] 当生命值低于50%时，受到的治疗效果增加{scale=10|10}%

\u7cbe\u5999\u6b65\u6cd5.card_desc: [护甲] 参与击败会减少所有技能的冷却时间{scale=8|8}%

\u80fd\u91cf\u5145\u6c9b.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 治疗友军时也会提高目标{scale=10|10}%的移动速度，持续1.5秒

\u8d85\u5927\u5bb9\u91cf.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 治疗药剂对友军的回复效果翻倍

\u8fc5\u6377\u533b\u7597\u5175.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 治疗药剂回复友军后，4.5秒内攻击速度增加50%

\u9003\u8131\u5927\u5e08.card_desc: [飞毛腿] 飞毛腿激活时获得{scale=6|6}%额外的伤害减免效果

\u9988\u8d60.card_desc: [治疗药剂] 如果击中队友而不是你自己，你将获得{scale=20|20}%的治疗效果

Reload.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Instantly reduce Healing Potions Cooldown by 1s for each target hit.

Sprint.card_desc: [Weightless] Gain an additional 10% bonus Jump Speed during Weightless.

Sturdy.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon no longer knocks you back and deals 25% less self damage.

Altruismo.card_desc: [Poción curativa] Obtienes un {scale=20|20}% del efecto de Poción curativa si la usas en un compañero, pero no en ti mismo.

Catalizador.card_desc: [Frasco explosivo] Los objetivos alcanzados con Frasco explosivo son marcados durante 3s y reciben un 40% más de daño de tu arma.

Cilindros laterales.card_desc: [Frasco explosivo] Se reduce la recarga de Frasco explosivo en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Correr.card_desc: [Ligero] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% adicional de velocidad de salto durante Ligero.

Desde arriba.card_desc: [Ligero] Reduces la recarga de Ligero en {scale=.5|.5}s.

Empuj\u00f3n refrescante.card_desc: [Ligero] Regeneras {scale=50|50} PS cada segundo mientras dura su efecto.

Escapista.card_desc: [Ligero] Obtiene {scale=6|6}% reducción de daño durante Ligero.

Escombros.card_desc: [Frasco explosivo] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al alcanzar a un enemigo con Frasco explosivo.

Excelencia medicinal.card_desc: [Poción curativa] El radio de Poción curativa aumenta un {scale=8|8}%.

Gravit\u00f3n.card_desc: [Frasco explosivo] La duración de la ralentización de Frasco explosivo aumenta en {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

M\u00e9dico de combate.card_desc: [Poción curativa] El Lanzapócimas ahora cura 750 PS a aliados.

Movimiento sagaz.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones reducen las recargas activas un {scale=8|8}%.

Perspicacia.card_desc: [Frasco explosivo] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% más de robo de vida contra enemigos ralentizados por Frasco explosivo.

Recargar.card_desc: [Poción curativa] Su recarga se reduce al instante en {scale=0.6|0.6} s por cada aliado que alcanzas.

Resiliencia.card_desc: [Arma] Tu arma ya no te hace retroceder e inflige un {scale=20|20}% menos autodaño.

Valent\u00eda.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibes un {scale=6|6}% más de curación cuando tu salud está por debajo del 50%.

Apertar o Passo.card_desc: [Elixir de Cura] Aliados atingidos pelo Elixir de Cura recebem {scale=6|6}% de velocidade de movimento por 3s.

Catalisador.card_desc: [Poção Explosiva] Inimigos atingidos pela Poção Explosiva são marcados por 3s e recebem 40% a mais de dano dos seus disparos.

Correr Faz Bem.card_desc: [Leveza] Regenera {scale=50|50} de vida por segundo enquanto Leveza estiver ativa.

Corrida.card_desc: [Leveza] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de velocidade adicional no salto durante Leveza.

D\u00e1diva.card_desc: [Elixir de Cura] Você ganha {scale=20|20}% dos efeitos do Elixir de Cura caso acerte um membro de equipe e não a si mesmo.

Estilha\u00e7os.card_desc: [Poção Explosiva] Acertar um inimigo com a Poção Explosiva dá {scale=1|1} de munição.

Imp\u00e1vido.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=6|6}% a mais de cura enquanto estiver com menos de 50% de vida.

Medicina para Todos.card_desc: [Elixir de Cura] Aumenta o raio do Elixir de Cura em {scale=8|8}%

M\u00e9dico de Combate.card_desc: [Poção de Cura] O Lançador de Poções agora também cura os aliados em 750 de vida.

Mega Po\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Elixir de Cura] O Elixir de Cura fica mais potente e cura os aliados 100% mais.

Movimento Sagaz.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações reduzem em {scale=8|8}% todos os intervalos ativos.

Perspic\u00e1cia.card_desc: [Poção Explosiva] Recebe {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida contra inimigos desacelerados pela Poção Explosiva.

Recarregar.card_desc: [Elixir de Cura] Reduz na hora o intervalo do Elixir de Cura em {scale=0.6|0.6}s para cada aliado atingido.

Robusto.card_desc: [Arma] Você sofre {scale=20|20}% a menos de dano autoinfligido e nenhuma repulsão.

Tanques Laterais.card_desc: [Poção Explosiva] Reduz o intervalo da Poção Explosiva em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

\u0411\u0435\u0433.card_desc: [Невесомость] Cкорость прыжка во время действия Невесомости увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0411\u043e\u0434\u0440\u044f\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Невесомость] Во время действия Невесомости вы восстанавливаете {scale=50|50} ед. здоровья в секунду.

\u0411\u043e\u043a\u043e\u0432\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Взрывающаяся колба] Перезарядка Взрывающейся колбы сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0412\u0434\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Взрывающаяся колба] Попадание по врагу Взрывающейся колбой генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпаcов.

\u0413\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Взрывающаяся колба] Длительность замедления от Взрывающейся колбы увеличивается на {scale=0.25|0.25} с.

\u0414\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Попав Исцеляющим эликсиром в союзника, вы получаете {scale=20|20}% от его эффекта.

\u0414\u0435\u0440\u0437\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% больше исцеления.

\u041a\u0430\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Взрывающаяся колба] Цели, задетые Взрывающейся колбой, отмечаются на 3 с. и получают на 40% больше урона от ваших выстрелов.

\u041a\u0443\u0440\u0430\u0436.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Скорость передвижения задетых Исцеляющим эликсиром союзников увеличивается на {scale=6|6}% на 3 с.

\u041c\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440 \u0.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Радиус действия Исцеляющего эликсира увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.
[Невесомость] Во время действия Невесомости вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона.

\u041c\u0435\u0433\u0430\u044d\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Исцеляющий эликсир исцеляет союзников на 100% больше.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0437\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Каждое попадание по союзнику мгновенно сокращает перезарядку Исцеляющего эликсира на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u0435\u0432\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий эликсир] Зельемет исцеляет союзников на 750 ед.

\u0421\u043c\u0435\u043a\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Взрывающаяся колба] Вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма против врагов, замедленных Взрывающейся колбой.

\u0422\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0434\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваше оружие больше не отбрасывает вас и наносит вам на {scale=20|20}% меньше урона.

\u0425\u0438\u0442\u0440\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=8|8}%.

Boczne zbiorniki.card_desc: [Wybuchowa kolba] Skraca czas odnowienia Wybuchowej kolby o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Drobny mak.card_desc: [Wybuchowa kolba] Trafienie przeciwnika Wybuchową kolbą generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Grawiton.card_desc: [Wybuchowa kolba] Wydłuża spowolnienie spowodowane przez Wybuchową kolbę o {scale=0.25|0.25} s.

Katalizator.card_desc: [Wybuchowa kolba] Cele trafione Wybuchową kolbą zostają oznaczone na 3 s i odnoszą 40% obrażeń od strzałów z twojej broni.

Lekarska perfekcja.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Zwiększa zasięg działania Mikstury leczniczej o {scale=8|8}%.

Medyk polowy.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Dozownik mikstur przywraca teraz 750 PZ sojusznikom.

Megamikstura.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Mikstura leczy sojuszników o 100% więcej.

Mistrz ucieczek.card_desc: [Nieważkość] Zapewnia {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń w trakcie trwania Nieważkości.

Od\u015bwie\u017caj\u0105cy bieg.card_desc: [Nieważkość] Każda sekunda w stanie Nieważkości zapewnia regenerację {scale=50|50} PZ.

Prze\u0142adowanie.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Każde trafienie sojusznika natychmiast skraca czas odnowienia Mikstury leczniczej o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Rozeznanie.card_desc: [Wybuchowa kolba] Zapewnia {scale=10|10}% do kradzieży życia wrogów spowolnionych przez Wybuchową kolbę.

Sprint.card_desc: [Nieważkość] Zapewnia w stanie Nieważkości dodatkowe {scale=10|10}% szybkości skoku.

Sprytny ruch.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=8|8}%.

\u015awi\u0119ty Miko\u0142aj.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Zyskuje {scale=20|20}% efektu działania mikstury leczniczej, jeżeli trafi innego członka drużyny, a nie siebie.

Szybkim krokiem.card_desc: [Mikstura lecznicza] Zapewnia sojusznikom trafionym Miksturą {scale=6|6}% szybkości ruchu na 3 s.

Twardziel.card_desc: [Broń] Twoja broń zadaje ci o {scale=20|20}% mniej samoobrażeń i nie odrzuca cię.

Werwa.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, zwiększa leczenie o {scale=6|6}%.

Znad g\u0142owy.card_desc: [Nieważkość] Skraca czas odnowienia Nieważkości o {scale=.5|.5} s.

Basiret.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Şişe] Patlayıcı Şişe tarafından yavaşlatılmış düşmanlara karşı %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazan.

Dayan\u0131kl\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Silahın seni geri itmez ve kendine %{scale=20|20} daha az hasar verirsin.

Depar.card_desc: [Ağırlıksız] Ağırlıksız süresince %{scale=10|10} bonus Zıplama Hızı kazan.

Enerjik Ad\u0131m.card_desc: [Şifa İksiri] Şifa İksiri ile vurulan müttefikler 3sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} hareket hızı kazanır.

Graviton.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Şişe] Patlayıcı Şişe'nin Yavaşlatma süresini {scale=0.25|0.25} sn artır.

Hafif Ko\u015fu.card_desc: [Ağırlıksız] Ağırlıksız esnasında her saniye {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Hediyeci.card_desc: [Şifa İksiri] Kendine değil de bir takım arkadaşına isabet ettirdiğinde Şifa İksiri etkisinin %{scale=20|20} kadarını kazanırsın.

\u0130lave Depo.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Şişe] Patlayıcı Şişe'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn azalt.

Kataliz\u00f6r.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Şişe] Patlayıcı Şişe ile vurulan hedefler, 3 sn boyunca işaretlenirler ve senin Silah Atışlarından %40 artırılmış hasar alırlar.

Kurnaz Hareket.card_desc: [Zırh] Saf dışı bırakmalar tüm aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=8|8} azaltır.

Par\u00e7ac\u0131klar.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Şişe] Patlayıcı Şişe ile bir düşmana vurmak {scale=1|1} cephane oluşturur.

Sava\u015f S\u0131hh\u0131yesi.card_desc: [Şifa İksiri] İksir Atıcı artık müttefikleri de 750 can iyileştirir.

T\u0131bbi \u00dcst\u00fcnl\u00fck.card_desc: [Şifa İksiri] Şifa İksiri'nin Etki Alanını %{scale=8|8} artır.

Yeniden Doldur.card_desc: [Şifa İksiri] Şifa İksiri'nin Bekleme Süresini vurulan her müttefik için anında {scale=0.6|0.6} sn azalt.
